trans-unit.source: Represents a <see langword="try" /> block with any number of <see langword="catch" /> clauses and, optionally, a <see langword="finally" /> block.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see langword="try" /> 區塊和任意數目的 <see langword="catch" /> 子句，亦可選擇 <see langword="finally" /> 區塊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement> can be used to represent a `try`/`catch` block of code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement> 無法用來代表`try` / `catch`的程式碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.TryStatements%2A> property contains the statements to execute within a `try` block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.TryStatements%2A>屬性包含內執行的陳述式`try`區塊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.CatchClauses%2A> property contains the `catch` clauses to handle caught exceptions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.CatchClauses%2A>屬性包含`catch`子句來處理已攔截的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.FinallyStatements%2A> property contains the statements to execute within a `finally` block.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.FinallyStatements%2A>屬性包含內執行的陳述式`finally`區塊。

trans-unit.source: Not all languages support `try`/`catch` blocks.
trans-unit.target: 並非所有語言都支援`try` / `catch`區塊。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A> method with the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport.TryCatchStatements?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag to determine whether a code generator supports `try`/`catch` blocks.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A>方法<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport.TryCatchStatements?displayProperty=nameWithType>旗標來判斷程式碼產生器是否支援`try` / `catch`區塊。

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates use of a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement> to define a try...catch...finally statement for exception handling.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement>定義 try … try...catch...finally 陳述式的例外狀況處理。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> objects that indicate the statements to try.
trans-unit.target: 指示 Try 陳述式要處理的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> objects that indicate the clauses to catch.
trans-unit.target: 指示 Catch 子句要處理的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" /> class using the specified statements for try and catch clauses.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 Try 和 Catch 子句陳述式來初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> objects that indicate the statements to try.
trans-unit.target: 指示 Try 陳述式要處理的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> objects that indicate the clauses to catch.
trans-unit.target: 指示 Catch 子句要處理的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> objects that indicate the finally statements to use.
trans-unit.target: 指示 Finally 陳述式要使用的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" /> class using the specified statements for try, catch clauses, and finally statements.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 Try 陳述式、Catch 子句和 Finally 陳述式來初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the catch clauses to use.
trans-unit.target: 取得要使用的 Catch 子句。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClauseCollection" /> that indicates the catch clauses to use.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClauseCollection" />，表示要使用的 Catch 子句。

trans-unit.source: Gets the finally statements to use.
trans-unit.target: 取得要使用的 Finally 陳述式 (Statement)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" /> that indicates the finally statements.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" />，表示 Finally 陳述式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the statements to try.
trans-unit.target: 取得要嘗試的陳述式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" /> that indicates the statements to try.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" />，表示要嘗試的 Try 陳述式。
